subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams coasted to the quarterfinals with a quick win over her sister, staying in contention for a calendar-year Grand Slam and showing that the gap between her and Venus was still widening.
snippet: Serena Williams coasted to the quarterfinals with a quick win over her sister, staying in contention for a calendar-year Grand Slam and showing that the gap between her and Venus was still widening.
